title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring non-perishable food items to donate to the local food bank. Items can be placed in the donation box in the foyer.

title: Baby Dedication
description: Celebrate with us as we dedicate our children to the Lord. If you would like to have your child dedicated, please contact the church office.

title: Clothing Drive for the SAF House in Nepal
description: There is another team heading to the SAF house in Nepal this coming spring.!! To that end, Shauna is hosting a clothing drive for the month of February to send along. She will have a collection box set out in the foyer. Contact Shauna with questions.

title: Ladies Spring Conference
description: The Ladies Spring Conference will be held at Grace Bible Church in Bozeman. The theme is 'The Priorities of a Godly Woman', with Dr. Vanessa Ellen speaking.
